task.title: Insert a picture from your device in a PowerPoint presentation
task.shortdesc: In this section, you will learn how to insert a picture from your device in a PowerPoint presentation.

taskbody.prereq:
You must have
Windows 7 or newer
Microsoft PowerPoint 2007 or newer
A PowerPoint presentation
A picture to be inserted to the presentation
Steps:

step.cmd: Select This device and navigate and select the desired picture.

result.p: You have inserted a picture from your device in the PowerPoint presentation.
